title: Enhancing Mathematical Problem-Solving Competencies Through Online Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: High school-level mathematics knowledge and basic digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment combining asynchronous collaborative activities via Wikispaces platform with real-time Zoom-based sessions

learning_goals: Learners can collaboratively solve complex mathematical problems by applying the jigsaw cooperative learning model.
Learners can systematically document knowledge sharing with peers using online collaboration tools (e.g., Wikispaces).
Learners can objectify their contributions in collaborative processes through a peer assessment system.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
